My research spans ecology, evolution, and ecophysiology. I study the role that time and uncertainity play in shaping plant responses to the environment. In particular, I focus on *phenology*, the timing of annually reoccuring life-history events like growth, maturation, reproduction, and dispersal. I view phenology as a unifying concept in ecology and evolution which integrates processes across biological scales and taxa, although my ecological and taxanomic expertise is primarily in alpine, arctic tundra, and agricultural plants. 

Phenology is an inherently individual and physiological process that can directly impact fitness, demography, and population persistence. At higher levels of organization, variation in phenological plasticity among species generates novel temporal community assemblies under variable environmental conditions. Taken together, these processes may scale to impact land surface and ecosystem phenology with critical implications for water, energy, agriculture, and ecosystem health.

## Publications  
 
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

library(yaml)

pubs <- yaml::read_yaml("publications.yml")
 
# create cards
for (pub in pubs) { 
  cat("::: {.pub-card}\n")
  cat("::: {.pub-title}\n")
  cat(pub$title, "\n")
  cat(":::\n\n")
  
  cat("::: {.pub-authors}\n")
  cat(pub$authors, " (", pub$year, ")", sep = "")
  if (nchar(pub$journal) > 0) {
    cat(". *", pub$journal, "*.", sep = "")
  }  
  cat("\n")
  cat(":::\n\n")

  # links 
  if (length(pub$links) > 0 || !is.null(pub$slug)) {
    cat("::: {.pub-links}\n")
    
    # add deets button if slug exists
    if (!is.null(pub$slug)) {
      cat("[{{< fa circle-info >}} Details](articles/", pub$slug, 
          "){.btn .btn-outline-info .btn-sm} ", sep = "")
    }  
    
    for (link in pub$links) {
      if (!is.null(link$url) && nchar(link$url) > 0) {
        cat("[{{< fa ", link$icon, " >}} ", link$text, "](", link$url, 
            "){.btn .btn-outline-", link$type, " .btn-sm} ", sep = "")
      } else {
        cat("[{{< fa ", link$icon, " >}} ", link$text, 
            "]{.btn .btn-outline-", link$type, " .btn-sm .disabled} ", sep = "")
      }
    }
    cat("\n:::\n")
  }
  
  cat(":::\n\n")
}
```
